acsSlow.body: We are putting you in contact with the operator of your payment method for transaction authorization.
acsSlow.title: Waiting for a response from your bank…

ariaLabels.informationLink: To learn more about the campaign

DOMAIN_UNKNOWN.title: The payee is having problems with the response

DONATIONLIST_ERROR: We were not able to load the list of organizations.

donationPage.description: You have until 23 December to donate. You can donate with your card without fees. The amount will be paid directly to the account of the organization to which you choose to donate.
donationPage.dismissDescription: If you want, you can donate to one of the humanitarian organizations that joined the initiative.
donationPage.dismissTitle: The service is no longer active
donationPage.entity: Who do you want to donate to?
donationPage.ioDescription: Donate with the IO app to receive an email with information concerning tax benefits.
donationPage.modalBody2: You can donate with your cards without fees.
donationPage.title: Donate for the crisis in Ukraine
donationPage.volunteer: How much do you want to donate?

indexPage.description: You can pay by card, bank account or payment app. You will receive the payment result via email.
indexPage.title: Pay a notice

formErrors.name: Enter name as shown on the card

inputCardPage.helpLink: Where can I find the security code?

modal.description: It is a three-digit code, called CVV or CVS, which you can find on the back of your card.
modal.descriptionAE: On American Express cards, the code (CID) has four digits and is located on the front.
modal.title: Security code

inputCardPage.title: Enter card information

INVALID_CARD.body: Try to enter valid card information or contact us for help if necessary.
INVALID_CARD.title: We are sorry, the card is not valid

INVALID_DECODE.body: Try again or contact us for help.
INVALID_DECODE.title: There was an error reading the data

INVALID_QRCODE.body: If the problem continues, try entering the information manually.
INVALID_QRCODE.title: The scanned code is not a pagoPA notice

header.disclaimer: The amount is updated automatically, therefore you will always pay what is due and avoid arrears or other interest.

NOTLISTED.body: Try again or contact us for help.
NOTLISTED.title: An unexpected error occurred

PAYMENT_CANCELED.body: Contact the payee for more information.
PAYMENT_CANCELED.title: The payee revoked this notice

PAYMENT_DUPLICATED.body: If you paid on this website, the receipt was sent to the email address you indicated during payment.
PAYMENT_DUPLICATED.title: This notice was already paid!

PAYMENT_EXPIRED.body: Contact the payee for more information.
PAYMENT_EXPIRED.title: The notice has expired and it can no longer be paid

PAYMENT_ONGOING.body: If the problem continues, report it to us!
PAYMENT_ONGOING.title: A payment is already in progress, try again later

PAYMENT_UNAVAILABLE.title: There is a technical problem with this notice

PAYMENT_UNKNOWN.body: The notice may have already been paid. To get support, contact the Payee.
PAYMENT_UNKNOWN.title: We can’t find the notice

pspUnavailable.body: This error might occur when the amount to be paid is particularly high, or if you’re trying to pay for a digital tax stamp.
pspUnavailable.title: The selected method is not available

paymentEmailPage.description: You will receive the payment result at this address
paymentEmailPage.title: Enter your email

findOutMoreModal.title: Cosa fare se il pagamento non va a buon fine?
findOutMoreModal.section1ContentRow1: Ricorda di pagare l'avviso entro le scadenze previste dall'ente.
findOutMoreModal.section1ContentRow2: Se non riesci tramite questo sito,
findOutMoreModal.section1ContentRow2Link: scopri gli altri canali abilitati a pagoPA.
findOutMoreModal.section2ContentRow1: Di solito l'importo viene riaccreditato entro pochi minuti.
findOutMoreModal.section2ContentRow2: In altri casi, il trasferimento di denaro sul tuo conto o carta potrebbe richiedere più tempo.
findOutMoreModal.section3ContentRow1: Se dopo 5 giorni lavorativi non hai ancora ricevuto il rimborso,

0.body: We have sent the payment receipt to {{useremail}}
0.title: You have paid {{amount}}

2.body: No amount was charged. Check you have correctly followed the instructions from your bank.
2.title: Authorization denied

3.body: If you paid using a debit or credit card, make sure to enter the data as shown on the front of the card.
3.title: The payment method information is not correct

4.body: No amount was charged. For your security, you have a limited amount of time to complete the operation.
4.title: The session has expired

5.title: The card circuit is not supported

6.title: Some data is missing in order to proceed with the payment

7.body: Contact your bank for more information.
7.title: The payment method has expired or is no longer valid

10.body: No amount was charged. You have probably exceeded the limits set by your bank.
10.title: Authorization denied

12.title: The payment method is not supported

17.body: You will receive the payment result at the address {{useremail}}.
17.title: Wait for payment confirmation

18.body: L’importo autorizzato è stato rimborsato sul tuo metodo di pagamento. Il trasferimento di denaro potrebbe richiedere del tempo.
18.title: Il pagamento non è andato a buon fine

25.body:
Non è stato addebitato alcun importo.
 Se il problema persiste, prova a usare un altro metodo o gestore del pagamento.
25.title: Il pagamento non è andato a buon fine

116.body: Non è stato addebitato alcun importo. Prima di riprovare, aggiungi fondi alla carta o usa un altro metodo di pagamento.
116.title: Il saldo della tua carta è insufficiente

117.body: Non è stato addebitato alcun importo. Il codice (CVV o CVC) ha 3 cifre ed è riportato sul retro della carta. Se usi American Express, il codice (CID) ha 4 cifre ed è sul fronte.
117.title: Il codice di sicurezza inserito è errato

121.body: Non è stato addebitato alcun importo. Prima di riprovare, modifica il limite di spesa o usa un altro metodo di pagamento.
121.title: Hai superato il limite di spesa della tua carta

3dsNotInitiated.body:
No amount was charged.
If the problem continues, contact the operator of the payment method, your bank for example.
3dsNotInitiated.title: There was a problem with the operator of your payment method

survey.body: Tell us about your experience with the payment and help us improve.
survey.title: Could you share your experience with us?

disclaimer.yourCard: Suggested because you are already a customer

drawer.body: This list contains all the operators compatible with your method, even if you are not their customer.
drawer.title: Which operator do you want to use for payment?

modal.body:
All money transfer operations (cash or electronic currency) have a cost that is used to guarantee that the payment is safe and successful.
Every operator (or PSP, Payment Service Provider) indicates a cost, according to their commercial policies and contractual conditions.
With pagoPA, these costs are transparent and the citizen can freely select the most convenient and affordable option. To learn more, consult the page
modal.cancelBody: All the data will be lost.
modal.cancelTitle: Do you want to cancel the payment in progress?
modal.title: Why is there a fee?

paymentChoicePage.description: To learn more about the methods and costs applied by the participating operators, visit the page

form.description: Notice code and payee tax code
